sub_topic: Solving systems of linear equations with noisy data
message_1:
Consider the following system of linear equations with noisy data:

\begin{align*}
4x - 3y +0.5z &= 6.2 \\
2x + 5y + z &= 9.9 \\
x - y + 2z &= -0.1
\end{align*}

Find the solution $(x, y,z)$ of the system of equations using the matrix method. Round each value to two decimal places.
